General.Name: Eit Environmental Development Group
General.Description: EIT Environmental Development Group Co., Ltd provides municipal environmental sanitation services in China. The company offers urban sanitation service, property management services, urban municipal lighting, urban park greening management, smart city construction, urban management consulting, human resource outsourcing, rural revitalization fund, forestry carbon sink development, waste sorting and recycling, and food waste disposal services. EIT Environmental Development Group Co., Ltd was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Haisong Building, Tairan 9th Road, Shenzhen, China, 518040
